attributes.action: Give Barry Humphies a knighthood or even a damehood if he’d prefer
attributes.background: Barry brought us Dame Edna Everage. As an Australian he proudly represents and spreads awareness of our monarchy beyond the British isles. We should acknowledge his great achievements and thank him dearly.

rejection.details:
You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours

We only reject petitions that don’t meet the petition standards.
